propDescriptions.action: A ref for imperative actions. It currently only supports focusVisible() action.
propDescriptions.autoFocus: If true, the select element is focused during the first mount
propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component. To learn how to add your own colors, check out Themed components—Extend colors.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.defaultListboxOpen: If true, the select will be initially open.
propDescriptions.defaultValue: The default selected value. Use when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.getSerializedValue: A function to convert the currently selected value to a string. Used to set a value of a hidden input associated with the select, so that the selected value can be posted with a form.
propDescriptions.indicator: The indicator(*) for the select.    ________________   [ value        * ]    ‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
propDescriptions.listboxId: id attribute of the listbox element. Also used to derive the id attributes of options.
propDescriptions.listboxOpen: Controls the open state of the select's listbox.
propDescriptions.name: Name of the element. For example used by the server to identify the fields in form submits. If the name is provided, the component will render a hidden input element that can be submitted to a server.
propDescriptions.onChange: Callback fired when an option is selected.
propDescriptions.onClose: Triggered when focus leaves the menu and the menu should close.
propDescriptions.onListboxOpenChange: Callback fired when the component requests to be opened. Use in controlled mode (see listboxOpen).
propDescriptions.placeholder: Text to show when there is no selected value.
propDescriptions.renderValue: Function that customizes the rendering of the selected value.
propDescriptions.size: The size of the component. To learn how to add custom sizes to the component, check out Themed components—Extend sizes.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
propDescriptions.value: The selected value. Set to null to deselect all options.
propDescriptions.variant: The global variant to use. To learn how to add your own variants, check out Themed components—Extend variants.

slotDescriptions.button: The component used to render the button.
slotDescriptions.endDecorator: The component used to render the end decorator.
slotDescriptions.indicator: The component used to render the indicator.
slotDescriptions.listbox: The component used to render the listbox.
slotDescriptions.root: The component used to render the root.
slotDescriptions.startDecorator: The component used to render the start decorator.
